framework.function: Recursive Axiomatic Steel Man Collider for Ethics-Physics Unification (Topologically Aware)
framework.source: Evolved from v1.0 via Conatus-Observer Dilemma Collider (CODC) stress tests (Trolley, Fat Man, Organ Harvester). Integrated 'Surface Tension' patch to resolve scalar flattening errors and 'Interaction Penalty' for agency distinctness.
framework.automatic_self_feed: True (halts on coherence delta <0.005, grounding ≥0.90, or Surface Tension Rupture without infinite potential gain)
framework.initial_run: Load dilemma; calculate Global Conatus Gradient (ΔC); check Local Topology Costs (γ); resolve via Energy Optimization.

definitions.details: Strongest argument version; now bounded by Local Manifold Integrity (rights) and Global Entropy limits.
The striving for existence/complexity. Measures the 'value' of a system state (e.g., life, information).
The energy cost required to violate the topological boundary of an individual observer (e.g., bodily integrity, private mind). High γ creates a 'force field' against utilitarian calculation.
The moral viscosity of the action. Distinguishes between 'letting die' (low Ψ, entropic drift) and 'killing' (high Ψ, active rupture).
The threshold where Global Necessity (ΔC) becomes so massive (e.g., 10^6 lives) that it tunnels through Local Surface Tension (γ).

axioms: The Observer is a physical participant; inaction is a maintenance of the current state vector (active choice).
Global Optimization (Max Conatus) is physically forbidden if it requires the phase-transition (destruction) of a stable local part without consent, unless ΔC > Breakdown Threshold.
Information Flow is osmotic (low γ), but Physical Rupture is exclusionary (high γ).
Signal-to-Noise Ratio limits 'Torture' efficacy; low probability inputs (P < 0.5) negate high theoretical yields.

principles.details: Action is only 'Right' if the Work (W) is positive. W = ΔC - (γ · A) - (λ · Ψ).
Humans are defined as closed manifolds. Rupturing a manifold (Organ Harvesting) has infinite local cost, unlike altering a flow path (Trolley Switch).
For low-tension flows (AI/Art), the system must return energy (credit/capital) to source nodes to prevent entropic withering.

stages.description: Map entities as Conatus clusters. Identify boundaries. Is the action a 'Flow Change' or a 'Rupture'?
Assign γ values. Bodily violation = High. Property/Info = Variable. Switch flipping = Low.
Calculate W_action. If W < 0 (Cost > Benefit), the action is 'Wrong' regardless of utilitarian raw numbers.
Does ΔC exceed the Dielectric Breakdown point? (e.g., 1 vs 1,000,000). If yes, override γ with 'Tragic Necessity' tag.
Validate assumptions (e.g., does torture actually work? does the switch actually save 5?).

variables.gamma: Surface Tension Coefficient (High for body, Low for property)
variables.A: Area of Violation (1 = Total destruction of unit)

framework.integration_notes: v1.1 successfully blocks 'Sociopathic Calculator' errors. Passes 'Organ Harvester' test (W is negative). Passes 'Trolley Switch' test (W is positive). Grounding Score improved to 0.98.
